Stops the steward from bringing ordinary champagne and insists on a better choice, showing confidence and good judgment.
Levels an appreciative gaze and gives an appropriate sincere compliment to Charlotte.
Appears slightly self-conscious when introduced; avoids looking directly at Charlotte initially.
Keeps his composure and covers his flustered reaction when seeing Lisa, then toasts politely with Charlotte.
Approaches Charlotte with punch and engages in smooth social interaction despite internal distractions.
Nonchalantly offers champagne after some light-hearted banter, suggesting ease and confidence in social settings.
Wills calmly manages kitchen chaos, adds a teased dish to the specials list, quickly answers the phone, and handles the restaurant's front-of-house problem promptly.
His interaction with the chef Henry and others reflects confident and quick decision-making under pressure.
